text: I want you to hear the truth from me as
much as I can share not as a prince or
joke
but as Harry Wow what a speech you can
read all the palace statements that you
like but this one came from the heart
these are the five takeaways from that
speech one Harry is not happy this isn't
a place he wanted to be but he felt he
could not continue with the role and he
needed to do something about it and I
know I haven't always done it right but
as far as this goes there really was no
other option - this is not Megan's fault
all that talk of many challenges over
many years that's his way of saying lay
off the wife this is about me that the
woman I chose as my wife upholds the
same values as I do and she does three
this is Harry's call not Megan's over
and over again he says I made the
decision I decided to step back the
decision that I have made for my wife
and I to step back is not one I made
lightly
for and this is the biggie Harry wanted
to continue with a royal role in the end
they couldn't work it out between the
palace and the Sussex is our hope was to
continue serving the Queen the
Commonwealth and my military
associations but without public funding
unfortunately that wasn't possible but
he's making it clear he thought he might
be able to stick with a royal job and
five Harry still hates the media but the
media is a powerful force and my hope is
one day collective support for each
other can be more powerful he takes
another swipe at what he calls a
powerful force he's not clear about why
but he still hates us
you
